Introduction.Title: Introduction to Python in Kannada
Content: Python ondu high-level, interpreted mathu general-purpose programming language. Idara simplicity mathu readability nimittha popular aagide.
Idannu Guido van Rossum 1991 ralhi release madidru. Python procedural, object-oriented mathu functional programming na support madutte.
Python web development, data science, artificial intelligence, automation mathu scientific computing thara vibhinna kshetradalli upayogisal agutte.
Idara dynamic typing mathu automatic memory management nimittha code yaziruvudu sulabha. Windows, macOS, Linux elladralu smooth agi nadutte.
Python ondu interactive shell REPL (Read-Eval-Print Loop) kooda provide madutte, idu quick code testing mathu debugging ge upayogavagutte.

Popular.Title: Why Python is popular?
Content: Popular frameworks jothege Django mathu Flask web development ge best, mathu TensorFlow mathu PyTorch AI mathu Machine Learning kshetradalli powerful aagive.
Python automation ge tumbha upayogi. Web scraping, testing, scripting ella easy agutte.
Top companies Google, Facebook, Netflix, NASA Python na use maduttave, idu reliable mathu efficient agide annodu torisutte.
Python easily C, C++, Java jothe integrate madabahudu, idu multi-language projects ge useful agutte.
Python doddadaru small scripts inda enterprise applications varege ella type projects madalu suitable.

Installation.Title: Installation of Python
Content: Python na Windows, macOS mathu Linux nalli install madalu simple steps:
Windows:
1. Python official website inda download madi: https://www.python.org/downloads/
2. Installer run madidaga 'Add Python to PATH' tick madabeku.
3. Command Prompt open madi `python --version` type madi check madi.
macOS:
1. macOS nalli Python pre-installed iratte, adhare latest version website inda download madabahudu.
2. Installer run madi step-by-step instructions follow madi.
3. Terminal open madi `python3 --version` command type madi check madi.
Linux:
1. Linux distributions nalli Python pre-installed iratte.
2. Ubuntu users ge `sudo apt update` mathu `sudo apt install python3` command run madabeku.
3. `python3 --version` command use madi installation verify madabahudu.
